about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Advancing healthcare through technology and innovation
about.bio1: As a dedicated Biomedical Engineer currently pursuing my Master's degree at Hochschule Anhalt, I specialize in medical software development, healthcare IoT, and advanced biomedical instrumentation. My journey in healthcare technology began with hands-on experience managing critical medical devices across 15+ healthcare facilities.
about.bio2: During my tenure at AM Medical Co. in Cairo, I successfully managed maintenance and calibration for 25+ critical medical devices, achieving 99.9% operational uptime while ensuring full FDA/ISO 13485 compliance. My implementation of Python-based monitoring software reduced service response time by 40% and resolved 95% of technical issues within 24 hours.
about.bio3: My technical expertise spans multiple programming languages including Python (3+ years), MATLAB (4+ years), C/C++, and SQL, with specialized knowledge in embedded systems for medical applications. I'm particularly passionate about developing diagnostic algorithms and predictive maintenance solutions that improve device accuracy by up to 30%.
about.bio4: Currently based in Germany, I'm actively seeking internship and working student positions in medical software development and clinical engineering, where I can contribute to cutting-edge healthcare technology solutions while expanding my expertise in the European medical device landscape.
about.msc_title: Master of Science in Biomedical Engineering
about.msc_description: Specialized in Medical Software Development, Healthcare IoT, and Advanced Biomedical Instrumentation. Core coursework includes Medical Device Software Validation, Clinical Engineering Management, and Healthcare Data Analytics.
about.beng_title: Bachelor of Engineering in Biomedical Engineering
about.beng_institution: Higher Institute of Engineering, El-Shorouk, Cairo
about.beng_description: Graduated with 70% overall average and 90% in final project focused on Augmented Reality in Medical Education developed using Unity. Key coursework included Biomedical Signal Processing, Medical Electronics, and Embedded Systems for Medical Applications.
